short_notes: Hey everyone! Presenting version 7.0, which officially integrates the four Experimental Bots into the main gameplay as new AI Modes! You can now switch between any of the five total bot modes whenever you want, and I've also included a new Debug mode that lets you see exactly how the AI bot decides each move! The shortcut does have to restructure a lot of its iCloud data in order to run version 7.0. It also uses a new GitHub-powered updater I designed. I hope you enjoy!
